text: Altmühltal is a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (federation of municipalities) in the district of Weißenburg-Gunzenhausen and Eichstätt in Bavaria in Germany. It consists of the following municipalities: *Alesheim *Dittenheim *Markt Berolzheim *Meinheim == Rhine–Main–Danube Canal == The final section to be built of the Rhine–Main–Danube Canal (which enables barges to navigate from the North Sea to the Black Sea) runs between Nuremberg and Kelheim. This issue became politically controversial in the 1970s and 1980s, mainly because of the long section through the Altmühl valley. ==See also== *Kleines Schulerloch inscription Category:Verwaltungsgemeinschaften in Bavaria Category:Weißenburg- Gunzenhausen
title: Altmühltal
